## Goals

- Discuss how experiments are created via timelines
- Discuss how to debug errors along the way

### Tuesday

Please complete the following BEFORE class:

### Thursday

- Read the documentation on [conditional timelines](https://www.jspsych.org/7.3/overview/timeline/#conditional-timelines) and [providing feedback](https://www.jspsych.org/7.3/overview/dynamic-parameters/#providing-feedback)
